item.title: HBase 介绍
item.description: What is HBASE NoSQL: Not Only SQL Column-Oriented Database Based on Google BigTable HDFS as Storage TB/PB data and Random Access 解决10条记录和1000千万记录同样的读写性能问题 RDBMS 问题 HBASE VS MYSQL Google Big Table A Bigtable is a sparse, distributed, persistent multidimensional sorted map.
